title: Auto-backlinks from blog entries via referral logs
summary: Now this is pretty cool (via Bill Seitz): Disenchanted has referral-based automatic backlinks. Funny thing is, since I started using the little SiteMeter web bug, I've been refreshing the referrals fun. But, constructing the referral report right in the entry is another sort of WeblogWithWiki-esque feature I hadn't even thought about. Now if only I had access to my access_log here. Maybe I'll be checking out another host soon. There's got to be a way to make this work with Movable Type and / or Radio UserLand.
